title: Simstodin Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Sandwiches and cakes, fresh juice, smoothies, tea and coffee. Everyday there's something vegetarian as well gluten-free including cake. A case displays some prepared foods. Located in Hafnarstaeti, the town's main shopping street. Has Wi-Fi.
